Kurwins Cauteriser was a unique enchanted scimitar that once belonged to the infamous mortician Kurwin, who committed his depravities sometime before the late 15 century DR.
The Cauteriser possessed a simple enchantment that heated up the blade, burned the targets with each slash, and had a chance of lighting the target aflame. Its slashes could also lacerate the target, leaving them bleeding.
The Cauteriser was the weapon wielded by the mortician Kurwin, who used its magic blade to dissect cadavers. Eventually, the mortician found a bit too much pleasure in dissections and switched to other subjectsâ€”folk who wouldnt be missed. However, Kurwins crimes came to an end after he targeted a tavern owner of some repute and the mortician was ratted out to the law. Subsequently, Kurwins Cauteriser ended up in the paws of the kobold grave-robber Bugthimble, who desecrated the Lower City Graveyard in Baldurs Gate in the .
